roleset.name: grasp without looking

example.name: intransitive
example.text: More stocks opened over the ensuing half hour, as the 49 Big Board specialist firms in charge of keeping the market orderly groped to find buy orders from major brokerage firms to match the selling flood.
example.arg: the 49 Big Board specialist firms in charge of keeping the market orderly
to find buy orders from major brokerage firms to match the selling flood

example.name: finally!
example.text: John groped Mary. Then she broke his fingers.

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls rummage-35.5, touch-20-1.
